T02TD3785E:224b-3: bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa /
T02TD3785E:224b-4: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3785E:224b-5: dam pa tog dkar dga' ldan pho brang dam pa ru //
T02TD3785E:224b-6: mi pham mgon la rgyal tshab dam par dbang bskur zhing //
T02TD3785E:224b-7: 'dzam gling nyid du glang chen thal ka ltar gshegs gang //
T02TD3785E:224b-8: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog / ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer dam par zas gtsang sras //
T02TD3785E:224b-9: bud med skyon bral g-yo sgyu spangs pa lha mdzes yum //
T02TD3785E:224b-10: lhums su zla bcur blo gros ldan pa sh'akya'i rigs //
T02TD3785E:224b-11: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog / lum bi'i tshal ni dben zhing nyams dga' pla ksha yi //
T02TD3785E:224b-12: yal ga nas bzung bltams gyur tshang dang brgya byin 'dud //
T02TD3785E:224b-13: mkha' la gshegs te phyogs bcur padma byung gyur gang //
T02TD3785E:224b-14: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'di bde legs shog / gzhal med khar mdzes dam par drang srong 'dun mdzad nas //
T02TD3785E:224b-15: mtshan ltas shis par brjod de ston par 'byung 'gyur dang //
T02TD3785E:224b-16: sh'aka rigs bud med 'khor ldan kun bsus rgyan btags gang //
T02TD3785E:225a-0: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog / gzhon nu'i stobs ni @225a * //
T02TD3785E:225a-1: sgyu rtsal yig rtsis 'phong la sogs //
T02TD3785E:225a-2: kun las mthar byung lha mi la sogs kun gyis mchod //
T02TD3785E:225a-3: sh'akya'i rigs 'khrungs log rtog bsal phyir btsun mo'i 'khor //
T02TD3785E:225a-4: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog / pho brang nas byung rga na shi ba la sogs gzigs //
T02TD3785E:225a-5: mi rnams rmongs mdzad lha yis mdun bdar mkha' la ni //
T02TD3785E:225a-6: srid gsum dag las rgal phyir mthon mthing dbu skra bregs //
T02TD3785E:225a-7: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog / lha rnams rdzu 'phrul gyis ni ngur smrig gos rnams phul //
T02TD3785E:225a-8: nee ranydza na'i chu bor dka' thub ma lus rdzogs //
T02TD3785E:225a-9: thub pa bsam gtan la bzheng bkra shis 'o thug bzhes //
T02TD3785E:225a-10: bkra shis dam pa des kyang der 'dir bde legs shog / padma las byung khyu mchog byang chub shing drung du //
T02TD3785E:225a-11: skyil mo krung bcas mi g-yo mchog gis bdud btul nas //
T02TD3785E:225a-12: tho rangs bdud btul mi 'gyur phun sum sangs rgyas pa //
T02TD3785E:225a-13: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog / w'a r'a na sir chos kyi 'khor lo mgon pos bskor //
T02TD3785E:225a-14: kun shes la sogs lnga sde bzang la bden bzhi bstan //
T02TD3785E:225a-15: lha klu lha min mi min 'dun gyur gang //
T02TD3785E:225a-16: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog / nga rgyal snyems par ldan pa'i ston pa drug btul cing //
T02TD3785E:225a-17: glang chen rab smyo mi bzad lha sbyin gyis rbad btul //
T02TD3785E:225a-18: drang srong mchog la spre'u rgyal cang shes sbrang rtsi phul //
T02TD3785E:225a-19: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog / padmo gzhon nu lta bu'i mtshan ltas sh'akya'i rigs //
T02TD3785E:225a-20: zas gtsang sras su rgyal rigs 'khor los sgyur rgyal du //
T02TD3785E:225a-21: bltams pa nas bzung lha yi ma lus rdzogs par ris dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog / byams pa'i stobs ni 'gro ba ma lus sgrol mdzad cing //
T02TD3785E:225a-22: sems can mtha' yas zhi bde'i lam la bkod gyur te //
T02TD3785E:225a-23: grong khyer rtsva mchog dam par dgongs pa yongs rdzogs gang //
T02TD3785E:225a-24: bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog / bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so /
